name: Going Postal [Demo]
description:
Build your own post office with a friend! Log packages, throw them at customers, upgrade your post office, and make a ton of cash in this arcade local coop game.

Keyboard Controls (Controller support is available.)

Player 1: WASD to move, Q for actions

Player 2: IJKL to move, U for actions

This is the early-access demo version of "Going Postal." The full release is TBA. I'm looking to get as much feedback as possible so please leave a comment with your thoughts. I hope you enjoy :)
